name: GMTK Jam 2020 - Out Of Control
description:
Hello!
Here is my submission for the GMTK Jam 2020! When I heard that the theme was 'Out of Control' I thought back to NPCs and the struggle of keeping them alive and safe. So I decided to take this idea build the game around defending a NPC that is running around on their own.

I really hope you enjoy this game! Please let me know if there are any issues and all feedback is welcomed!

Mark
